FuncDef: This command sets the minimum allowable virtual path identifier (VPI) value that can be used on the ATM interface for a VPC.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the minimum allowable VPI value that can be used on the ATM interface for a VPC. Values-0 to 4095 (NNI)
0 to 255 (UNI). ParamDefault: Default- 0
